column2: United Nations backs BlackRock
column3: State Street low carbon funds NEW YORK
column4: Dec 11 The United Nations said Thursday it provided the initial funding for two new exchange-traded funds from BlackRock Inc and State Street Corp that invest in companies with low carbon emissions.

column2: Yum's November same-restaurant sales in China fell 15 pctUPDATE 1-Yum's November same-restaurant sales in China fall 15 pct Dec 11 Yum Brands Inc said on Thursday its sales at established restaurants in China dropped 15 percent in November but are improving from that level this month.
